title: A View from the Fed
content: September 2016 December 2015 December 2014  2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 2019 2020  0  1  2  3  4  Percent  Figure 3.  Federal Funds Rate Paths from the PD Survey       Note:  Based on the median of the modal forecasts from the primary dealer (PD) surveys conducted before the December 2014, December 2015, and September 2016 meetings of the Federal Open Market Committee.      Source:  Federal Reserve Bank of New York.
